summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to regular property taxes; providing for the submission to the qualified voters of the City at an election called on November 8, 2005, of a proposition authorizing the City to levy property taxes for up to three years in excess of the 101% limitation and any other limitation on levies in Chapter 84.55 RCW for the purpose of providing City services, including police and human services.
note: Save Streets Initiative / Civil Streets Initiative
